name: Eco Angus Ltd
description:
Suppliers of MCS accredited wood burning boilers.
Simple solutions for greener heating.

product_images.title: Angus Orligno 500
product_images.description:
The Angus ORLIGNO 500 Pellet Boiler
-Burns pellets 6-8mm Diameter 10-50mm Long
-Rated at 92% gross heat efficiency
-255 litre container for long burn times without necessity for extra loading
-Self ignition
-Spacious combustion chamber with large opening for easy fuel loading
-Boiler has microprocessor controller to ensure fuel burn efficiency and control numerous safety features
-170 hour burn time at average power
-93 hour burn time at average power
-46 hour burn time at maximum power
-Effective design of feeder system ensures correct burning process, avoids blockages in fuel feeding,avoids fouling of the furnace,backfire to the container and blow out.
-Suitable for open vented system or pressurized system
-This boiler must be fitted with an appropriately sized stainless steel twin wall flue (single wall flue is not suitable)

product_images.title: Angus Orligno 200
product_images.description:
The Angus Orligno 200 Gasification Log Boilers
-This is our top of the the range wood gasification log boilers
-Full MCS and Hetas certification
-Rated at 92% gross heat efficiency
-Logs from 500mm to 1000mm long and up to 10" diameter depending on size of boiler
-Suitable for open vented or pressurized system
-8mm inner jacket for prolonged life cycle
-Minimal ash output
-Must be installed with appropriately sized accumulator tank (50:1 ration of kW output to litres of thermal store) and Laddomat thermoregulator to ensure maximum efficiency of the boiler
-Silicon sealed glass fibre rope on loading chamber door for tight seal
-New door handle locking mechanism to enable a strong seal of the loading chamber with the minimum of effort
-Absorber strip to take any smoke loss form loading chamber to the side of the boiler
-Connections for cooling coil at rear of boiler for ease of installation in confined spaces
-Mechanical heat exchanger cleaning handle
-Hinges on doors can adjusted vertically or horizontally
-Fan modulation adjustable for maximum burn efficiency
-Primary and secondary air vents adjustable to optimize burn efficiency
-Specially designed firebrick that has a 1 year warranty. It is made of high grade alumina silica refractory concrete heat resistant to 1350 degrees Celsius and improves the flow of the combustion gases through the combustion chamber.
-Hinged control panel cover
-Remote control with 15 metre wire as extra can be fitted to control panel
-This boiler must be fitted with an appropriately sized stainless steel twin wall flue (single wall flue is not suitable)

product_images.title: Angus Super
product_images.description:
The Angus Super Gasification Log Boilers
-This is one of our top range wood gasification log boilers
-Full MCS and Hetas certification
-Rated at 92% gross heat efficiency
-Logs from 500mm to 1000mm long and up to 10" diameter depending on size of boiler
-Suitable for open vented or pressurized system -6mm inner jacket for long life cycle
-Minimal ash output
-Must be installed with appropriately sized accumulator tank (50:1 ration of kW output to litres of thermal store) and Laddomat thermoregulator to ensure maximum efficiency of the boiler
-Mechanical heat exchanger cleaning handle
-Hinges on doors can adjusted vertically
-Fan modulation adjustable for maximum burn efficiency
-Primary and secondary air vents adjustable to optimize burn efficiency
-Remote control with 15 metre wire as extra can be fitted to control panel
-This boiler must be fitted with an appropriately sized stainless steel twin wall flue (single wall flue is not suitable)
